name: Lamek Onyango
text: The AI consultation helped me understand my symptoms better. The followâ€‘up with a real doctor was seamless!

name: Nikki Mackenzie
text: Amazing experience! The symptom checker is accurate and the recommendations were very helpful.

name: David Simiyu
text: Great platform for quick health assessments. The interface is user-friendly and professional.

name: Felix Musau
text: I was skeptical at first, but the AI provided insights that my doctor later confirmed. Highly recommend!

name: Elias Keya
text: Very convenient for getting quick medical advice without leaving home. The responses are thorough.

name: Victor Ngige
text: The emergency feature gave me peace of mind when I wasn't sure if my symptoms were serious.

name: Martin Njau
text: Helpful for tracking my health over time. The history feature is very useful.
